snippet: Softbank of Japan is nearing a deal to buy control of Sprint Nextel, giving the struggling American cellphone service provider a deep-pocketed backer to help finance its turnaround effort, Michael J. de la Merced reports for DealBook.
abstract: Softbank of Japan is nearing a deal to buy control of Sprint Nextel, giving the struggling American cellphone service provider a deep-pocketed backer to help finance its turnaround effort, Michael J. de la Merced reports for DealBook.

headline.main: Daily Report: Softbank Is Said to Be Near Sprint Deal
